title: Message to the National Association of Real Estate Boards.
text:
My dear Mr. Culver:

I cordially share your view that an outstanding opportunity for public service awaits the Realtors in the field of stimulation of home ownership, which is so vitally related to the health, happiness and civic pride of our people.

Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Harry H. Culver, President, National Association of Real Estate Boards, 310 S. Michigan Avenue, Chicago, Ill.]
